resources.string: OAT: \n The feature %s is disabled and cannot be accessed at the moment. Enable this feature in the settings of the App.\n IMPORTANT: Delete the message above to preserve your password!
OAT: \n The requested feature %s does not exist. Ensure that you typed the name correctly.\n IMPORTANT: Delete the message above to preserve your password!
OAT: \n The device is currently located at the following coordinates: %f,%f\n IMPORTANT: Delete the message above to preserve your password!
OAT: \n The password \"%s\" is invalid. Ensure that you typed the name correctly.
